author: mwbrooks
msg: Use Markdown syntax instead of HTML to link Keywords Index.

author: mwbrooks
msg: Add Events section to PhoneGap API.
- Add deviceready event
- Add Events section to ToC

author: mwbrooks
msg: Add joDoc HTML template.
It looks nice and matches the joDoc default template.
Credit for the frameset idea and CSS goes to the joDoc team.

author: mwbrooks
msg: Rename public/ to template/ for clarity.
Templates may not necessarily be HTML public directories.
For example, we could have a JSON template or PDF template.
The PhoneGap template is moved to a separate directory
inside template/ to allow us to create other templates.

author: mwbrooks
msg: Add Introduction and Table of Contents.
The Introduction will act as a landing page.
Someday, it may be renamed to index.md, but
currently I am using introduction.md because I
plan for index.html to be a frameset.
The Table of Contents is a special joDoc that
can parse files and recursive directories to build
a ToC automatically.
I'm not using any of that.
This is a basic ToC that is autolinked using Keywords,
which are also a nice feature of joDoc.
